title: I am buying Pokemon Yellow. I too will name my pokemon after GDers
body:
You will pick an available pokemon and I will name it after you when I capture it.
I have named Gary "Curator", and Ash "Cynicat".

Ok, go crazy.

Only one person can be the pokemon I can only get one of, unfortunately, so I'll add some stuff to the list here
**Here is a list of unobtainable pokemon in yellow:**
Weedle, Kakuna, Beedrill
Ekans, Arbok
Raichu
Meowth, Persian
Koffing, Weezing
Jynx
Electabuzz
Magmar
Hitmonchan
Flareon
Jolteon
Mr. Mime(obtained in trade, can't be named)
Omanyte, Omastar

The album:
http://imgur.com/a/yDyA3
